text: īmāṉ koṇṭavarkaḷē! Allāhviṉ pātaiyil (pōrukkup puṟappaṭṭuc) celluṅkaḷ eṉṟu uṅkaḷukkuk kūṟappaṭṭāl, nīṅkaḷ pūmiyiṉ pakkam cāyntu viṭukiṟīrkaḷē uṅkaḷukku uṉṉa nērntu viṭṭatu? Maṟumaiyaiviṭa ivvulaka vāḻkkaiyaik koṇṭē nīṅkaḷ tiruptiyaṭaintu viṭṭīrkaḷā? Maṟumai(yiṉ vāḻkkai)kku muṉpu ivvulaka vāḻkkaiyiṉ iṉpam mikavum aṟpamāṉatu
